# progressViewStyle

**Instance Property**

The current graphical style of the progress view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var progressViewStyle: UIProgressView.Style { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is a constant that specifies the style of the progress view. The default style is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIProgressView/Style/default]. For more on these constants, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIProgressView/Style].

## Configuring the progress bar

- **progressTintColor**: The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that’s filled.
- **progressImage**: An image to use for the portion of the progress bar that’s filled.
- **trackTintColor**: The color shown for the portion of the progress bar that isn’t filled.
- **trackImage**: An image to use for the portion of the track that isn’t filled.
